title: Collaborative Conceptual Understanding and Knowledge Co-Construction of the Law of Energy Conservation

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational physics knowledge and basic understanding of energy concepts
context.additional_context: Building a smartphone-based collaborative learning environment to cultivate problem-solving abilities through understanding physics concepts applicable to workplace scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts of the law of energy conservation and apply them to everyday life examples.
Learners can collaboratively create concept maps with peers using the CSCCM tool.
Learners can reconcile differing opinions during concept map collaboration through integrative-conflict resolution strategies.

resources: Case Materials on the Law of Energy Conservation
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
